text: Laphriini is a tribe of robber flies in the family Asilidae. There are about 7 genera and at least 80 described species in Laphriini. ==Genera== These seven genera belong to the tribe Laphriini. * Andrenosoma * Cerotainiops * Dasylechia * Lampria * Laphria (bee-like robber flies) * Orthogonis * Pogonosoma ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * * * * ==External links== * * * Category:Laphriinae Category:Brachycera tribes
title: Laphriini
